title: Giuliani’s Son Hilariously Bad, AI Gets Freakier 5.21.21
itunes:title: Giuliani’s Son Hilariously Bad, AI Gets Freakier 5.21.21
description:
In episode 914, Jack and Miles are joined by actor and Soul Balm host Clark Moore to discuss Andrew Giuliani running for New York governor, an army of 16 year olds taking on the Democrats, AI creating music and movie translations, Zack Snyder's Army Of The Dead, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. New York, Andrew Giuliani wants to be your next governor.
  2. Andrew Giuliani says he has spent five decades in government even though he's 35 years old.
  3. An 'Army of 16-Year-Olds' Takes On the Democrats
  4. AI turns The Spice Girls' "Wannabe" into a pretty solid Nine Inch Nails song
  5. This AI Makes Robert De Niro Perform Lines in Flawless German
  6. Box Office: Zack Snyder’s ‘Army Of The Dead’ Nabs $780K As ‘Godzilla Vs. Kong’ Tops ‘Bad Boys For Life’
  7. Tig Notaro Herself Is an Incredible Visual Effect in Zack Snyder's Army of the Dead
  8. With Zack Snyder’s ‘Army of the Dead,’ Netflix Aims to Fix Its Franchise Problem
  9. The Secret Sauce Behind Netflix’s Hit, “House Of Cards”: Big Data
  10. The Most Popular Original and Licensed Series on Netflix During the Pandemic
  11. International heist dramas are suddenly Netflix’s biggest hits
  12. How the zombie represents America’s deepest fears
  13. First, Eat All the Lawyers
  14. The Heist Film: Stealing with Style
  15. LISTEN: Nina Sky - Move ya body (Remi Oz remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
